metadata.description: A twisted expanse of ravines and canyons scarred into the Wewew's wilderness. Barren rock formations loom over scree-swept valleys, where skeletal trees creak in the wind like mournful whispers.
metadata.significance: The Scourgefens are a battleground for the warring factions vying for control of Wewew. Rumors speak of an ancient evil stirring within its depths, as the very fabric of reality begins to unravel.
